member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListView.OnUpdateStatus
member.remarks: Invokes method to update the status fields (only).

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListView.UpdateStatus
member.remarks: Updates only the status message fields in the flash list form.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListView.getStatusMessage(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a message associated with the flash item status

member.name: T:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListView.Message
member.summary: Class associates a color with a text string
member.remarks: Used for the status message fields.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.#ctor
member.remarks: Creates a new flash loader object

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.Delete
member.remarks: Destructor for the singleton Loader object

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.GetInstance
member.remarks: Method provides access to the singleton Loader object.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.ParseMessage(System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.remarks: Method parses ASB messages which in this application are received in the Listener object.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.DeserializeString(System.Byte[]@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Convert byte array elements into a String
member.param: Array to convert to a String
Index into array where conversion starts
member.returns: A String from the byte array
member.remarks: Reads one String out of the specified byte stream starting at the specified location. The index passed as a parameter is updated to the start of the next value in the byte array.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.GetVersion
member.remarks: Method returns the current Loader object firmware version String.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.WriteFlash
member.remarks: Method writes the currently selected file to flash memory. A file should already have been selected before calling this method, but it bails out if mFilename is empty.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.getNumRecords
member.summary: Return number of records to flash
member.remarks: Used by the progress bar to track flash progress.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.GetFlashStateMessage
member.remarks: Method returns the current flash state message String. The message is updated during the flash process to indicate the action in progress, errors, etc.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.viewNumRecordsFlashed
member.summary: Return number of records flashed so far
member.remarks: Used by the progress bar to track flash progress.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.ClearFlashComplete
member.remarks: Method supplies the GUI with a way to reset for another flash by clearing the previously completed flash condition.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.setICB2IPAddr(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: Set a new ASB IP address
member.returns: True if IP accepted, False otherwise.
member.remarks: The current IP is unchanged if the one provided in the argument fails for any reason.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.GetFilename
member.summary: Return current name of file to flash

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.SendMessage(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Send a message to the ASB
member.remarks: Method sends the provided message to the ASB currently set up for communication.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.QueryICB2Version
member.remarks: Method sends a message to the current ICB2 asking for its firmware version string. The return message is storead in the Loader object's mVersion member.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader.SendHexRecord
member.summary: Send a hex record for flash
member.remarks: Forms and sends a single hex record to the ASB to be flashed.

member.name: T:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.Loader
member.remarks: Defines members and methods associated with the ASB flash loader utility application. Only a single Loader instance can be created. The Loader object manages a single FlashItem and GUI interfaces.

member.summary: Opens dialog to select a file to flash

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.MainGUIForm.OpenFlashListToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.remarks: Mechanism to flash a list of files to ASBs.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.MainGUIForm.FlashButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.remarks: Creates a progress bar and calls the flash write method.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.MainGUIForm.UpdateFields
member.summary: Updates info display of the loader object

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.#ctor
member.remarks: The fundamental object dealing with flashing a whole list of firmware. Parsing the list file and managing the flash instruction sequences are its main tasks. The view for info display and control is done by the FlashListView object.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.GetInstance
member.summary: Returns access to the flash list object
member.returns: Reference to the singleton flash list object.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.Delete
member.remarks: Sets interlock so DoFlash thread exits.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.StartFlash
member.remarks: Creates a progress bar control and kicks off the thread that does the actual flashing.

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.FlashListComplete
member.summary: Returns state of flash list completion

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.ParseFile(System.String)
member.returns: True if success, False if failed.
member.remarks: Stream reads a list filename and extracts out the supplied IP and filename to be flashed at that IP. Entries are comma separated. Comment lines begine with "#".

member.name: M:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData.DoFlash
member.summary: Thread that flashes the list of ICB2s

member.summary: Access to flash object's IP (as a string)

member.summary: Access to flash object's firmware file to flash

member.name: T:ICB2_Flash_Loader_GUI.FlashListData
member.summary: Implements flashing multiple ICB2s in a list.
